document.full_text: tornadoes and floods, which have killed at least 10 people in arkansas this week, threatened more destruction in the mid-south and ohio valley region tuesday and wednesday, forecasters said.
document.title: more twisters, flooding expected in mid-south
lines_and_colors: tornadoes and floods, which have killed at least 10 people in arkansas this week, threatened more destruction in the mid-south and ohio valley region tuesday and wednesday, forecasters said.
